All utilities (except electrcity) are included in the rent together with access to club house and other indoor/outdoor amenities. The rent also includes premium cable service with premium channels like HBO, Showtime, Starz, Cinemax to name a few. The owner/landlord pays condominium fees which covers all utilities, facilities and premium cable (internet not included).
Rent: $2,800/month. Minimum Lease Term: 12 months.
